{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Imports

{% raw %} 
from flair.embeddings import WordEmbeddings
from flair.data import Sentence
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from flair.embeddings import TransformerWordEmbeddings
{% endraw %}

Type-based embeddings

{% raw %} 
embedding = WordEmbeddings('glove')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sentence = Sentence('I can can a can.')
embedding.embed(sentence)

[Sentence: "I can can a can ."   [− Tokens: 6]]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for token in sentence:
    print(token)
    print(token.embedding.shape)

Token: 1 I
torch.Size([100])
Token: 2 can
torch.Size([100])
Token: 3 can
torch.Size([100])
Token: 4 a
torch.Size([100])
Token: 5 can
torch.Size([100])
Token: 6 .
torch.Size([100])
{% endraw %}

Token-based embeddings

{% raw %} 
embedding = TransformerWordEmbeddings('roberta-base')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sentence = Sentence("It's okay to use the term Anglo-Saxon.")
embs = embedding.embed(sentence)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for tok in sentence:
    if tok.text == 'Anglo-Saxon':
        print(tok, tok.embedding.shape)

Token: 8 Anglo-Saxon torch.Size([768])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sents = [
    'I am playing basketball', 
    'I am playing football', 
    'I am a comma'
]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sents = [Sentence(sent) for sent in sents]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sents = embedding.embed([sent for sent in sents])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sents

[Sentence: "I am playing basketball"   [− Tokens: 4],
 Sentence: "I am playing football"   [− Tokens: 4],
 Sentence: "I am a comma"   [− Tokens: 4]]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
toks = [sents[0][3], sents[1][3], sents[2][3]]
for tok in toks:
    print(tok)

Token: 4 basketball
Token: 4 football
Token: 4 comma
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
vecs = [tok.embedding for tok in toks]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
cos = torch.nn.CosineSimilarity(dim=0)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print(
    cos(vecs[0], vecs[1]),
    cos(vecs[0], vecs[2]),
    cos(vecs[1], vecs[2]),    
       )

tensor(0.9349) tensor(0.8050) tensor(0.8052)
{% endraw %}
